name: You Have 10 Seconds 3
description: The official third installment in the You Have 10 Seconds series! Dodge spikes, lasers and solve puzzles to make it to the exit before time runs out! Over 300 new levels, brand new gameplay mechanics and more!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 1.5 Ghz Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 10 Processor: 2 Ghz+ Memory: 3 MB RAM Graphics: 256MB Storage: 1 GB available space
